room1.description: this is a room description, it should only be shown once

key.name: key
key.obtained_description: the key glitters in your hand. It feels...smaller than expected. But surely it can be used to open something?

chest.name: chest
chest.onground_description: there is a large chest in the left corner of the room. It has a giant lock on it which surprisingly, has a small keyhole
chest.pickup_description: you tried to pickup the chest, but its too heavy
chest.solved_description: you put the small key into the lock, the lock opened with a click sound
